event_name: Microsoft Security Immersion Event: Shadow Hunter
description:
Whether you’re a chief security officer or an on-the-ground security professional, defending against increasingly complex and sophisticated cyberattacks is a crucial skill.At this gamified, interactive event, you’ll become a cybersecurity analyst tasked with finding an attacker who has gained network access through a security camera in your office’s building. This practical experience will expand your security expertise, preparing you to detect threats and help secure hybrid cloud environments.As you track down the attacker, you’ll learn how to:
Check the security posture of your cloud resources using Microsoft Defender for CloudMonitor risky workloads with limited visibility, containers, servers, and storage servicesDetect threats and resolve incidents with Microsoft SentinelRegister now to strengthen your cybersecurity skills with practical experience.
